name: Space Invaders - DEMO
description:
Please check if app runs on Mac and Linux!

This is not finished. It is still in development!!

Hey guys it's been a while. This is my demo of a complete recreation of space invaders in a custom engine with SFML.

The best part about this is just unzip and run the file. No Java/.Net Runtime needed

This is still a very early version. The game is not finished and it is buggy. I'm still working on it.
